title: Policy debates break out across Washington; public opinion on insurrection still evolving
description: Sens. Bernie Sanders (I-Vt.) and Rob Portman (R-Ohio) discuss the future of bipartisanship and President Biden’s infrastructure plan. Fiona Hill breaks down the Biden-Putin summit. Carrie Dann looks at the numbers to see where consensus is emerging on the January 6th insurrection.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
